solution_line_template: Lorene has {georgia_stationery} x {lorene_multiplier} = <<{georgia_stationery}*{lorene_multiplier}={lorene_stationery}>>{lorene_stationery} pieces of stationery.
Thus, Georgia has {lorene_stationery} - {georgia_stationery} = <<{lorene_stationery}-{georgia_stationery}={fewer_stationery}>>{fewer_stationery} fewer pieces of stationery than Lorene.
